oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Photograph of captured German truck
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Photograph of soldiers with a captured German truck. A great variety of uniforms and footwear are visible. This photograph is associated with Homer Geiger, Btry. B, 114th Field Art., 30th Div. Btry. B consisted of men from Chattanooga and had previously been a Tennessee National Guard unit. The 30th Div. was composed of National Guard units from Tennessee and the Carolinas.
